bills.title: A resolution informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
bills.short_title: A resolution informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
bills.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Informs the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
bills.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Informs the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
bills.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S6; text as passed Senate: CR S6)

bills.title: A resolution informing the President of the United States that a quorum of each House is assembled.
bills.short_title: A resolution informing the President of the United States that a quorum of each House is assembled.
bills.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Informs the President that a quorum of each house of Congress has assembled.
bills.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Informs the President that a quorum of each house of Congress has assembled.
bills.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S6; text as passed Senate: CR S6)
